Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus. We are ignorant of the name of the senior, early Ptolemaic official to whom the document was addressed, but, since he had the same title as the recipient of P. Lille 122, it could be the same one. The body of the petition that followed has entirely disappeared.
